sys_script_include.description: The DevToolsGetParentRecord function is called by the DataSilos extension point instance class and returns a parent record for the given record if it can be determined.
sys_script_include.name: DevToolsGetParentRecord

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_239455bf1beff050edf3642aab4bcb4a
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_snc_investor.DevToolsGetParentRecord</api_name><caller_access>1</caller_access><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>The DevToolsGetParentRecord function is called by the DataSilos extension point instance class and returns a parent record for the given record if it can be determined.</description><name>DevToolsGetParentRecord</name><script><![CDATA[function DevToolsGetParentRecord(record)
{
	var GetRecord = x_snc_devtools.GetRecord;
	var strTable = grRecord.getRecordClassName();

	if (strTable == 'incident_task')
	{
		return GetRecord('incident',grRecord.incident);
	}

	return false
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-11-07 20:58:35</sys_created_on><sys_id>239455bf1beff050edf3642aab4bcb4a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>DevToolsGetParentRecord</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Investor WORK IN PROGRESS" source="x_snc_investor">8dc0a7971ba37050edf3642aab4bcbe0</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Investor WORK IN PROGRESS">8dc0a7971ba37050edf3642aab4bcbe0</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_239455bf1beff050edf3642aab4bcb4a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-11-07 20:58:35</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
